Package org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.mgmt.alarm

Interface Summary
AlarmProcessor Defines an interface for classes that can be used to process Alarm objects.
 

Class Summary
Alarm Alarm is the base of all the classes within the object model that define the contents of alarm messages.
AlarmChannel The AlarmChannel carries messages issued asynchronously by the Reader to the Host.
AlarmControl AlarmControl is the base class for all classes responsible for controlling the generation of Alarm messages, and consists of four main attributes.
AlarmManager This class manages the alarm generation.
EdgeTriggeredAlarmControl This class extends AlarmControl to control alarms generated when a monitored, integer-valued, model element first crosses a threshold value (the alarmThreshold).
FailedEraseAlarm FailedEraseAlarm extends the Alarm class.
FailedKillAlarm FailedKillAlarm extends the Alarm class.
FailedLockAlarm FailedLockAlarm extends the Alarm class.
FailedMemReadAlarm FailedMemReadAlarm extends the Alarm class.
FailedWriteAlarm FailedWriteAlarm extends the Alarm class.
FreeMemoryAlarm FreeMemoryAlarm extends the Alarm class.
IOPortOperStatusAlarm IOPortOperStatusAlarm extends the TTOperStatusAlarm class.
NotificationChannelOperStatusAlarm NotificationChannelOperStatusAlarm extends the TTOperStatusAlarm class.
ReaderDeviceOperStatusAlarm ReaderDeviceOperStatusAlarm extends the TTOperStatusAlarm class.
ReadPointOperStatusAlarm ReadPointOperStatusAlarm extends the TTOperStatusAlarm class.
SourceOperStatusAlarm SourceOperStatusAlarm extends the TTOperStatusAlarm class.
TTOperationalStatusAlarmControl This class extends AlarmControl to control alarms generated when a monitored model element of type OperationalStatus transitions to a new value.
TTOperStatusAlarm TTOperStatusAlarm extends the Alarm class, and is the base class for all Transition Triggered Operational Status Alarms.
 

Enum Summary
AlarmLevel The level of a reported alarm.
EdgeTriggeredAlarmDirection Controls the direction in which an edge-triggered alarm should fire.
EdgeTriggeredAlarmStatus Describes the status of an edge-triggered alarm.
